import "./SingleProduct.scss"; import prod from "../../assets/products/earbuds-prod-2.webp"; import RelatedProducts from "./RelatedProducts/RelatedProducts"; import { FaCartPlus, FaFacebookF, FaInstagram, FaLinkedin, FaTwitter, } from "react-icons/fa"; import useFetch from "../../hooks/useFetch"; import { useParams } from "react-router-dom"; const SingleProduct = () => { const { id } = useParams() const { data } = useFetch(`/api/products?populate=*&[filters][id]=${id}`) if (!data) return const product = data.data[0].attributes return (
{product.title} {product} Description
- 5 +
Category :Headphones Share :
); }; export default SingleProduct;
